attributes.action: have smokeing pubs and non somking pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we feel we have had freedon taken away from us we should have the freedom to go in a smokeing pub or nosmokeing pub my self am a nonsmoker and hate going out with friends and more as they go out site to have a smoke and leave me on my own if i get no join look out a shall stand as a councilor
this would also help pubs
